urls.title: Florida still not reporting how many hospitalized with COVID. DeSantis won’t say why.
urls.description: Under pressure last week as COVID-19 hospitalizations soared in Florida, Gov. Ron DeSantis’ office said the state would start reporting daily hospitalization data for all 67 counties.

text:
As COVID-19 hospitalizations soared in Florida, Gov. Ron DeSantis’ office said the state would start reporting daily hospitalization data for all 67 counties.

On Tuesday he refused to address the fact that the state has yet to make good on its promise. https://t.co/oSCyZ6kMFo
